RR_verdict: We believe the Cloudsurfer Trail from On significantly elevates its road version to become an exceptional all-terrain shoe—perfect for travel and versatile enough for varied adventures. It maintains the high-quality materials and overall feel of its counterpart but enhances outsole durability with a robust Missiongrip rubber and ruggedized upper modifications. However, we found the drop somewhat high for trail use, and it's priced slightly above most comparable shoes.
awards: Top pick in best On running shoes
